name: Basic Wild Photograpy
description: The students will explore a wide range of relevant contemporary theories  which is designed to stimulate a critically engaged practice to prepare  a range of related careers.

name: Framming and Composition
description: To show how an understanding of light and composition is worth more to you than a whole bagful of camera accessorie.To show how to take better photos in specific environments

name: Professional Wild Photograpy
description: The Foundation course in Photography places emphasis on more hands-on experience. A wide variety of photography styles are explored, such as Street, Studio, Landscape, and Portrait to mention a few.
